alfredsnippet.snippet:
"[Numerical modeling] is a technique you use to explain something you do not understand by applying math to other things you do not understand so you have a publication. If someone references it, you are that much better off. They do not have to know what you meant either."

- C J Ransom
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - CJ Ransom on Numerical Modeling
